items.title: _index
items.description: I’m Kaung Myatthu, often nicknamed Matthew. I’m into all things related to computers and a bunch of other stuff. This is my markdown based note taking system like my second brain.

items.title: Arch Linux Installation guide
items.description: Into § This is a very high level summary guide on installing Arch linux. This is not step by step tutorial for beginner. Prerequisite § Secure Boot Disabled Check if your system is UEFI or BOIS Burn the Arch linux iso on a usb device Installation § Reboot the machine pick usb device in bootloader and proceed to following.

items.title: Linux
items.description: This section include all things related to linux Arch Linux Installation guide Tmux .

items.title: Tmux
items.description: Tmux is terminal multiplexer, this is one of the tool that i can’t live without when i’m doing any computer scientisy work. Although it’s not a big deal using cursor when i’m on laptop because keyboard to touch pad travel is very close but when i’m in a traditional keyboard mouse setup it’s very terrible experience for me to constantly overworking my right hand to switch between mouse and keyboard.

items.title: Mathematics
items.description: Understanding the fundamentals of summation symbol (sigma) in mathematic Limits Normalizing a value from a range into another target range .

items.title: Normalizing a value from a range into another target range
items.description: To scale x into target range [a,b] xnormalized​=(b−a)max(x)−min(x)x−min(x)​+a Example, Scaling [0,60] minute to [0,1] range such that 30 minute will be expressed as 0.

items.title: Understanding the fundamentals of summation symbol (sigma) in mathematic
items.description: Summation Symbol (∑) § In mathematic the summation symbol capital sigma is generally used to reqpresents summation of similar terms. Simple Sum § For example, adding a sequence of number up to the n number starting from 1 can be compactly describe in this manner: i=1∑n​i=1+2+3+.

items.title: Avoiding Sunk Cost Fallacy
items.description: What’s sunk cost anyway? § Sunk cost is the cost the has been put in motioned which cannot be recovered. For example, in practice this can mean money that’s has been used to purchase machinery in a manufacturing line or past effort and time that has been put towards a goal.

items.title: Famine, Affluence And Morality
items.description: There are things we have to do and other optional. In other words obligatory things vs supererogatory Obligatory vs supererogatory § Imagine you’re have a meeting.

items.title: Mind
items.description: Avoiding Sunk Cost Fallacy Unveiling Lasting Happiness Famine, Affluence And Morality Success And Money - The Behavioural Side of Things .

items.title: Success And Money - The Behavioural Side of Things
items.description: These are key-points discussed from the book “Psychology of money” by Morgan Housel. The impact of luck and risk § Some religion describe luck as a positive destiny that was brought upon by past life’s do goods.

items.title: Unveiling Lasting Happiness
items.description: Discovering genuine and lasting happiness is a universal pursuit that goes beyond external achievements. Drawing inspiration from the principles of positive psychology, this article explores valuable insights on happiness.

items.title: Neovim C++ debugger setup using nvim-dap and mason
items.description: Download codelldb binary § To obtain codelldb binary, either install vscode extension lldb or download it using mason plugin. The path will be differs based on the method used to downloaded.
